content: Large traditional bank issue VCC cards. The BIN on these cards are from the 3rd largest bank in the USA. These cards will verify almost any service or platform including:PaypalEbayAmazonMercariDigital OceanGoogle AdwordsFacebook AdsBing AdsTaboolaAWSAzureOracle Cloud+MoreAll cards are AVS enabled. All cards are loaded with a $2 balance. Non re-loadable. If the card fails to verify your account we`ll give you a replacement card with a different BIN for free. BIN: 416719 BIN: 475699BIN: 555671Additional corporate credit card in both Visa and MasterCard BINS.$5 per card singles10 cards for $30BIN: 511572 $15 per card limit 2 per order.***All cards are corporate/business issue cards not personal BINS***Most Crypto accepted. Board escrow accepted for purchases of $60 or more, buyer pays fees.https://i.imgur.com/plDG7Vb.png Digital Oceanhttps://i.imgur.com/OJJoDrE.png Digital Oceanhttps://i.imgur.com/hjAhcBL.png Google Adwordshttps://i.imgur.com/ACHUIr1.png Bing Adshttps://i.imgur.com/wGRk46N.png BIN 416719https://i.imgur.com/B159yPK.png Card GEN BIN 416719https://i.imgur.com/oNJ1lDh.png BIN 511572https://i.imgur.com/ScSMFtB.pngBIN: 475699https://i.imgur.com/umuFK8b.png Card GEN BIN 475699Quality speaks for itself.We have many services and products for re-sellers or anyone who wants to start a VCC, VBA or wallet business: Including:Digital Ocean Accounts with $100 creditHigh Value AWS accountsLithic/privacy prepaid credit card issuing accounts (API integration not included) Start your own VCC business instantly. Fully formed USA Shelf Corporations with attached bank corporate accounts Corporate bank accounts that support unlimited VCC issuing and VBA creation full Login, admin access and 2FA includedAll products and services are created with our legal corporate information so the number of some products we can supply each month are limited. First come, first serve.For more information and a full list of products and services contact us on Telegram at:@resellersolutionshttps://t.me/Resellersolutions

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Quote from: resellersolutions on June 07, 2022, 09:40:34 PMMost Crypto accepted. Board escrow accepted for purchases of $60 or more, buyer pays fees.So, for sales under $60, the user should trust you? Why don't you accept escrow as long as the buyer will pay escrow fee?Do you have a list of websites that have been tested using the card and proven to work?Do I need to do KYC or send personal information?How can it be proven that they are legitimate and legal cards and not stolen or hacked?Do you have a site to make transactions or is it done manually? If it is manual, how do you deal with reliable services (the third largest bank) and you do not even have a website?

If it is manual, how do you deal with reliable services (the third largest bank) and you do not even have a website?K.I.S.S... Asking for a vouch copy would have been a lot easier... My telegram info is on the post or you can simply send me a message here. As for escrow. This is going to make me sound like an absolute class A a**hole but all the questions you asked me about my service, Provide me the member with the best escrow service here and besides the forum rep answer the same questions about them for me that you asked me about my service. Â As far as the cards being legality, these are cards issued from our accounts as either expense or employee cards. You`ll be getting the same card we issue vendors, employees or online service providers. Would be a bit messy using the same card for Google, AWS, LawDepot, state fees, and employee spending... Also we have multiple website. We provide non gray market business services on our site which is why I don`t list it here and why we have access to the tools and services we have access too. If this becomes worth time and resources then a dedicated a website will be created. Until then, its a post on a forum. With that said if you`d like a vouch card. Go ahead and contact me.https://i.imgur.com/B159yPK.png Your vouch card is ready to go. Next move is on you. @resellersolutionshttps://t.me/Resellersolutions
